get.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:REPORTINGCONFIG [READ]
Get a list of auto moderation actions
tags: Admin Extension Categories and Auto Moderation Actions

post.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:REPORTINGCONFIG [CREATE]
Create auto moderation action
tags: Admin Extension Categories and Auto Moderation Actions

get.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:REPORTINGCONFIG [READ]
Get a list of extension category data with the specified name

parameters.description: data order, asc or desc (default: asc)
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: data order key, valid key : 'extensionCategory', and 'extensionCategoryName'
parameters.name: sortBy

tags: Admin Extension Categories and Auto Moderation Actions

post.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:REPORTINGCONFIG [CREATE]
Create extension category data
tags: Admin Extension Categories and Auto Moderation Actions

get.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:REPORTINGCONFIG [READ]
TimeInterval is in nanoseconds.
When there's no configuration set, the response is the default value (configurable through envar).

parameters.description:
configuration category flag.
			set this to 'all' to retrieve all category configurations
			set this to 'extension' to retrieve [EXTENSION] category configurations
			leave it blank to retrieve core categories [UGC,USER,CHAT] configurations
parameters.name: category

post.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:REPORTINGCONFIG [CREATE]
The behaviour of this endpoint is upsert based on the namespace.
So, you can use this for both creating & updating the configuration.
TimeInterval is in nanoseconds.

get.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:REASON [READ]
Return list of reason groups ID and title under given namespace. To fetch the reasons inside a group, use get reason group endpoint.
get.summary: List reason groups under a namespace

parameters.description: query reasons under specified reason group
parameters.name: group

get.description:
<p>This endpoint get all reasons without pagination.</p>
<p> Required Permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:REASON [READ]</p>

<p>This endpoint get reasons not used by moderation rules.</p>
<p> Required Permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:REASON [READ]</p>
get.summary: Get list of reasons that not used by moderation rules

get.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:TICKET [READ]
Reports list can be ordered by:
- createdAt
- updatedAt

parameters.description: Only support one level of sortBy; default createdAt:desc
parameters.name: sortBy

post.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:TICKET [CREATE]
Submit a report and will return ticket for reported object.
New ticket will be created if no OPEN ticket present for reported object (based by objectId and objectType) in a namespace.

Admin can only submit report once for each different user / object reported in the same OPEN ticket. 
Reporting the same user / object in the same OPEN ticket will return HTTP code 409 (conflict).

Fill the 'reason' field with a 'reason title'
Supported category: <ul><li>UGC</li><li>USER</li><li>CHAT</li><li>EXTENSION</li></ul>

delete.description:
<p>This endpoint delete moderation rule.</p>
<p> Required Permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:RULE [DELETE]

put.description:
<p>This endpoint enable/disable moderation rule status.</p>
<p> Required Permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:RULE [UPDATE]

get.description:
<p>This endpoint get moderation rules.</p>
<p> Required Permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:RULE [READ]

<p>This endpoint get moderation rule.</p>
<p> Required Permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:RULE [READ]

Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:TICKET [READ]
Tickets list can be ordered by:
- createdAt
- reportsCount
- status (currently there are OPEN, AUTO_MODERATED and CLOSED statuses, desc order will put ticket with CLOSED status at the top)

parameters.description: data order, asc or desc (default: desc)
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: data order key, valid keys are createdAt, reportsCount, and status (default: createdAt)
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: filter tickets by status (OPEN, AUTO_MODERATED or CLOSED)
parameters.name: status

delete.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:TICKET [DELETE]
This endpoint will delete ticket and all its reports.

get.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:TICKET [READ]
List reports ordered by createdAt in descending order.

post.description:
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:TICKET [UPDATE]
Update ticket resolution status to either OPEN or CLOSED. It is mandatory to provide notes
post.summary: Update ticket resolution to a given status

get.description: Return list of reason groups ID and title under given namespace.
get.summary: List reason groups under a namespace

parameters.description: query reasons under specified reason group
parameters.name: group

post.description:
User need to be authenticated to access this endpoint.
Submit a report and will return ticket for reported object.
New ticket will be created if no OPEN ticket present for reported object (based by objectId and objectType) in a namespace.

User can only submit report once for each different user / object reported in the same OPEN ticket. 
Reporting the same user / object in the same OPEN ticket will return HTTP code 409 (conflict).

Fill the 'reason' field with a 'reason title'
Supported category: <ul><li>UGC</li><li>USER</li><li>CHAT</li><li>EXTENSION</li></ul>

duration.description: Ban duration in minutes, -1 means unlimited duration

skipNotif.description: Skip notification for banned user (e.g. email notification)

duration.description: Ban duration in minutes, -1 means unlimited duration

skipNotif.description: Skip notification for banned user (e.g. email notification)

action.description: GOING TO DEPRECATE, PLEASE DO NOT USE, for replacement use the "actions" field

category.description: Report category, must select from pre defined list

extensionCategory.description: Report extension category, consist of custom services sub-category (eg. salesItem,challenge,etc)

reason.description: Reason of report, can select from pre defined list, max 128 chars

threshold.description: the threshold to trigger auto moderation

action.description: GOING TO DEPRECATE, PLEASE DO NOT USE, for replacement use the "actions" field

extensionCategory.description: Report extension category, consist of custom services sub-category (eg. salesItem,challenge,etc)

serviceSource.description: Extension category service source (eg. service source 'marketplace' for extension category 'salesItem')

timeInterval.description: the unit is nanoseconds, must between 1 to 6000000 seconds

additionalInfo.description: Additional info regarding reported user / content, JSON formatted

category.description: Report category, must select from pre defined list

comment.description: Additional comment if any, max 280 chars

extensionCategory.description: Report extension category, must select from pre defined list

objectId.description: ID of content being reported, uuid4WithoutHyphens. Required for UGC category

objectType.description: Type of content being reported, max 64 chars. Required for UGC category

reason.description: Reason of report, can select from pre defined list, max 128 chars

userId.description: User ID being reported, in UUID4 format

notes.description: Info regarding the resolution status, max 280 chars

status.description: Ticket status is open, closed, auto moderated
